column4: Is it possible to amplify the volume in the headphones, using software, beyond what I get from using pavucontrol?
you might try mplayer -af volume=10 though
well you could download it with downloadhelper and play it, but yeah potentially inconvenient
I already have pavucontrol at maximum
but it did make a difference?
Well, no, since it was already at maximum before the current need arose...
okay... so if you lower the volume it changes?
for almost anything else I would've suggested not installing from a random .deb, but teamviewer is okay :p
personally I'd use the tar.gz instead of the deb, though
